attributes.action: Petition the queen to dissolve parliament and ban present members from resitting
attributes.additional_details: In not delivering the required outcome to a satisfactory level, parliament, parties and their individual members have proven to be incompetent in their role. As such if that person was in industry and or business and proved them selves incapable of delivering a given project they would be removed from post.
attributes.background: The UK voted to leave the EU, yet parliament, parties and individual MP’s have been unwilling to work to together to devliver Brexit. To this case MP’s voted into their position by their constituents have failed to represent them, and have proven to be unfit to represent them and should be removed.

rejection.details:
It’s not clear what the petition is asking the UK Government or Parliament to do.

We can't accept your petition because it's not clear what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

Under the Fixed Terms Parliament Act 2011 the Queen cannot dissolve Parliament.

You might like to sign these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235547
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/237487 https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/237424
